#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
int main()
{
	long long int m,n,i,j,p,a,b;
	cin>>m>>n>>p;
	long long int hash[m+1][n+1];
	memset(hash,0,sizeof(hash));
	for(i=0;i<p;++i)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		hash[a][b]=-1;
	}
	for(i=1;i<=m;++i)
	{
		if(hash[i][1]==-1)
		break;
		hash[i][1]=1;
	}
	for(j=1;j<=n;++j)
	{
		if(hash[1][j]==-1)
		break;
		hash[1][j]=1;
	}
	for(i=2;i<=m;++i)
	{
		for(j=2;j<=n;++j)
		{
			if(hash[i][j]==-1)
			continue;
			if(hash[i-1][j]>=0)
			hash[i][j] = (hash[i][j]+hash[i-1][j]+mod)%mod;
			if(hash[i][j-1]>=0)
			hash[i][j]= (hash[i][j]+hash[i][j-1]+mod)%mod;
		}
	}
	/*for(i=0;i<=m;++i)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=n;++j)
		{
			cout<<hash[i][j]<<" ";
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}*/
	if(hash[m][n]!=-1)
	cout<<hash[m][n]<<endl;
	else
	cout<<"0"<<endl;
	return 0;
}
